# id

**Instance Property**

A unique identifier that distinguishes this anchor from all other anchors.

## Declaration

```swift
var id: UUID { get }
```

## Inspecting an anchor

- **timestamp**
- **originFromAnchorTransform**: The position and orientation of this anchor in world space.

items.description: The position and orientation of this anchor in world space.
